title: The Week of Heidi Bryant: Mentor by Day, Hero by Night
summary: Heidi Bryant, a 19-year-old mentoring enthusiast, discovers her superpowers and combats a series of challenges to save her city over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Heidi Bryant, eine 19-jährige Mentorin, entdeckt ihre Superkräfte und bekämpft eine Reihe von Herausforderungen, um ihre Stadt im Laufe einer Woche zu retten.
summaryDutch: Heidi Bryant, een 19-jarige mentorliefhebber, ontdekt haar superkrachten en gaat een reeks uitdagingen aan om haar stad te redden gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Heidi Bryant, une jeune mentor de 19 ans, découvre ses superpouvoirs et affronte une série de défis pour sauver sa ville au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Heidi Bryant begins her week normally, teaching and mentoring young students. She feels a strange surge of energy as she explains complex topics with unusual clarity.
At dusk, while walking home, Heidi witnesses a robbery. She instinctively uses her newfound powers of telekinesis to stop the thieves, saving the day.
Heidi experiments with her powers, learning to control them. She feels a mix of excitement and fear.
News spreads of the mysterious savior. While her public identity remains unknown, Heidi feels a deep sense of responsibility to protect her city.
Heidi stops a potential disaster at a local factory using her telekinetic powers, drawing attention from media and local authorities.
Taking a break, Heidi enjoys a peaceful day mentoring, unaffected by her heroic alter-ego. Despite the chaos, she finds comfort in her regular activities.
Heidi confronts the mastermind behind the week's crimes in a final showdown, ensuring the safety of her city and embracing her role as a full-time superhero.

ending: Thus, Heidi learned that true power lies not only in strength but in the courage to responsibly use it.
moral: With great power comes great responsibility.
